item.title: PI Teleport when you click somthing
item.dc:creator: @Ground_zero_317 Ground zero 317
item.description:
@Ground_zero_317 wrote:

try this

this is for home tele only and you change the case

			case 4171:
        			if(c.inWild()) {
					if(c.wildLevel <= 20) {
                				c.getPA().movePlayer(x cords, y cords, height);
        				} else {
                				c.sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wild.");
        				}
				} else {
              				c.getPA().movePlayer(2653, 3280, 0);
        			}
			break;

item.title: PI Teleport when you click somthing
item.dc:creator: @yeoldhag yeoldhag
item.description:
@yeoldhag wrote:

I’m trying to make it when I click something, I teleport. This is as far as I got:
Opened up ClickObject.java :

			case 2:
			if(c.goodDistance(c.objectX+c.objectXOffset,

c.objectY+c.objectYOffset, c.getX(), c.getY(), c.objectDistance)) {
c.getPA().movePlayer 2273, 4695, 0;
}
break;

That doesn’t work. Any one know the right way to do it? Thanks!
